summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers," likely referring to unauthorized web scraping activities. It directs entities to respect robots.txt files and acknowledges that rate limiting may be applied. The bill promotes the use of the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) as a compliant method for accessing data for which scraping might be attempted . The implications of non-compliance can be inferred from the need for rate-limiting, and the overall focus seems to be on responsible digital interactions.
